name: START TWS01F
description:
Quick Connect Technology – Stable Bluetooth connection for smooth pairing with your smartphone or tablet.
Pure Bass Sound – High-quality drivers deliver deep bass and clear audio for music and calls.
Smart Touch Control – Control music playback, calls, and voice assistants with a simple touch.
Long Battery Life – Up to 4 hours of continuous playback on a single charge; the charging case extends usage 3–4 times.
Compact Charging Case – 250mAh case capacity keeps your earbuds powered on the go.
Comfortable In-Ear Fit – Lightweight ergonomic design for secure and comfortable wear all day.
Universal Compatibility – Works with iOS, Android, and other Bluetooth-enabled devices.

name: CELEBRAT T400 Airpods
description:
Bluetooth 5.1 chip, faster and more stable data transmission, ultra-low latency

Supports master/slave switching, Siri voice assistant can be activated by prolonged pressing of headphones left/right for 2 seconds

With 13 mm drive unit, supports dual channel function. Combined with the built-in power amplifier chip to create a striking stereo effect, low frequency thick and powerful, high frequency clear and bright.

Precise touch and convenient operation available

After the first successful pairing, subsequent intelligent detection, it is only necessary to open the lid and connect it immediately.

name: P47 wireless headphones.
description:
The headphones connect via Bluetooth 5.0+EDR and have a range of up to 10 meters. 
They are foldable and have a built-in microphone for calls. 
The headphones support multiple modes, including FM radio and TF card playback. 
They can be used in both wired and wireless modes, with a 3.5mm audio port for a direct connection. 
The headphones have a rechargeable battery that can last for several hours of use.
